00010         class Login
00011         {
00016                 const magic_phrase = "Nei boschi a Rumiai";
00017 
00022                 public static $logged_in;
00023 
00030                 static function is_logged_in()
00031                 {
00032                         if (!isset(Login::$logged_in))
00033                         {
00034                                 Login::$logged_in = FALSE;
00035                                 if (!empty($_COOKIE['_u']))
00036                                 {
00037                                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00038 
00039                                         $user_factory = new User();
00040                                         $users = $user_factory->find_all(array('where_clause' => "`username` = '{$conn->escape($_COOKIE['_u'])}'", 'limit' => 1));
00041                                         if (count($users) > 0)
00042                                         {
00043                                                 $user = $users[0];
00044                                                 Login::$logged_in = md5(self::magic_phrase . $user->password) == @$_COOKIE['_uid'];
00045                                         }
00046                                         
00047                                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00048                                 }
00049                         }
00050                         return Login::$logged_in;
00051                 }
00052         }
